name: A Rainy Walk
description:
You must return home, but the weather is bad. The umbrella is your only hope!

Play through several days of bad weather, featuring different obstacles, such as cars splashing at you, broken gutters, fountains and sinking platforms.

In this game you need some coordination because you must move the main character, and at the same time, you must move the umbrella around him in order to protect him from the water.

Levels become very challenging later in the game, you can test your skills and aim at improving your score.
